member.name: CD3D11_QUERY_DESC.CD3D11_QUERY_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_QUERY_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.
member.param: Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_QUERY_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_QUERY_DESC.CD3D11_QUERY_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_QUERY_DESC structure that is initialized with info for a query.
member.param: A -typed value that specifies the type of query.
A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies miscellaneous query behavior.

member.name: CD3D11_QUERY_DESC.CD3D11_QUERY_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_QUERY_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_QUERY_DESC
member.summary: Represents a query and provides convenience methods for creating queries.
